message:
PhoneGap/Cordova:
i want to create background service that run while the application closed, i found solutions work only when the application in background, any idea ?

data.message: I think it's better to go native for the service

I have used some plugins which allow me to run in the bg ... But when you kill the app it ends.
For your situation try to find something that work like push notifications always in the background.
Or try to share with us why you want it always in the bg.
What You are making is called a local notification. it is not a push notification

what about the background plugin ? 

it has all events required to handle the entire application life cycle.

--------------Edit

i think you miss with the Arch itself , somethings should be proceed in the server side and sent as Push notifications to the app.
